queries.title: 6. ORDER BY
queries.description: ADQL queries aiming to test the ORDER BY clause.

query.description: ORDER BY with column names with and without explicit ASC/DESC.
query.adql: SELECT id, ra, dec FROM atable ORDER BY id, ra ASC, dec DESC

query.description: ORDER BY with SELECT column index.
query.adql: SELECT id, ra, dec FROM atable ORDER BY 1, 2 ASC, 3 DESC

query.description: ORDER BY with expressions. (credits: Markus Demleitner)
query.adql: select x from t1 order by log10(z+1) desc, 2*x asc
